channel.title: MITB Rs Riot?
channel.description: MITB Rs RIot. Jagex is shit, and we should auto talk about it, Who thinks this should be done?

item.title: MITB Rs Riot?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

If we could have one everyday, i mean really, everyday. They might give in. Im not talking about 10 noobs waiting for a mute, i mean, like tons of people coming! If we can do that everyday, and they try to do shit like a new fucked up update about lower levels and talking priveleges. We will continue until they give in.

I personnaly wouldn’t attent these because i have a life. If no one does this, seriously, we won’t get shit back. They won’t change it.

Read full topic

Coldbloodio:

I used to play when there was about 120k players topping the charts at once around 1 pm…After the update I see over 140k+ people on. They probably wont do anything unless the charts fall below 90k[/quote][quote=“Java Ownz U, post:25, topic:164233”]They have been around 60-40k recently at some times after update

140k-120k
compared to
60k-40k

====================
BIG DIFFERENCE

hopefully they notice this.

item.title: MITB Rs Riot?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“ThugLife, post:19, topic:164233”]Yeah, alright ‘rioting’ is fine, pointless but fine. But what annoys me is that people are talking about the game as if it is their right to have it how they want the game to run.
I just don’t get why people still play it if they do not like the updates?[/quote]

Because they’ve put hundreds of hours into it… if they have a say in it, they’ll use their force. If they don’t like something, they try to change it, especially with so much time invested in it.

Read full topic

item.title: MITB Rs Riot?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Yeah, alright ‘rioting’ is fine, pointless but fine. But what annoys me is that people are talking about the game as if it is their right to have it how they want the game to run.
I just don’t get why people still play it if they do not like the updates?

Read full topic

item.title: MITB Rs Riot?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Dude, if they want to do an in-game riot, they should do it. People have spent years on RS, and if Jagex does something that destroys the game, the players have a right to disagree in the only way that will get their attention.

Read full topic

item.title: MITB Rs Riot?

item.title: MITB Rs Riot?

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

ThugLife:

Yes but it makes no sense, people riot about life changing things. Things people HAVE to do like say your government told you that they were adding an extra 3 hours onto your school day.

It makes perfect sense. They’re angry, therefore they complain, just like any normal human being would.

Read full topic

xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx:

what I think is moparisthebest should host a Server 24/7 and make it just liek rs so that the new updates Jagex Makes dont piss every one off, so till jegex comes to there sinces , Moparisthebest, Mark my workds MAKE YOUR OWN SERVER!

WTF Imposter? Who are you…?

[quote=“Casey., post:8, topic:164233”]These are pipe dreams you have mate.

A player mod will come along, mute your team, then move on.

I’d gladly attend, but sorry, I doubt it will do anything.[/quote]
